original_text: Then the Lord's angel went to the camp of the Assyrian army. He killed 185,000 of their soldiers. When people got up in the morning, they saw all those dead bodies! Then the Lord's angel went to the camp of the Assyrian army. He killed 185,000 of their soldiers. When people got up in the morning, they saw all those dead bodies! Then the Lord's angel went to the camp of the Assyrian army. He killed 185,000 of their soldiers. When people got up in the morning, they saw all those dead bodies!
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 나가서 앗수르 진중에서 십팔만 오천인을 쳤으므로 아침에 일찍이 일어나 본즉 시체뿐이라

sentences.original_text: to the camp of the Assyrian army
When people got up in the morning
they saw all those dead bodies!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 그 죽은 시체들을 보았습니다!
